message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-1-1, translated into en
data:
Goal 17: Strengthen implementation and promote global partnerships for sustainable development

Goal 17.1: Promote a multilateral, open, non-discriminatory, fair and international law-based trading system within the framework of the World Trade Organization, including promoting an end to it Negotiating Doha Development Agenda (global 17.10 target)

Indicator 17.1.1. Average import tax rate

June 2021

Ministry of Finance

No. 28 Tran Hung Dao - Hoan Kiem District - Hanoi

support@mof.gov.vn

The average import tax rate is the average tax rate applied to goods imported into Vietnam according to the List of Vietnam's imports and exports.

The average import tax rate is calculated by the weighted average method, using the weighted method based on the value of imported goods.

Vietnam product industry system promulgated under Decision No. 43/2018/QD-TTg dated November 1, 2018 of the Prime Minister

Administrative data of the Ministry of Finance.

2 years

Ministry of Finance

Ministry of Finance

The indicator reflects the average tariff rate that a quantity of foreign goods is brought into the Vietnamese market.

2020 framework data only

(Published source: 2020 national report on 5-year progress towards implementation of sustainable development goals. Data from the Ministry of Finance)

Corresponding global level indicator “17.10.1: Worldwide weighted tariff-average”

- Circular No. 03/2019/TT-BKHDT dated January 22, 2019 stipulating the set of statistical indicators for sustainable development of Vietnam;

- https://unstats.un.org/sdgs/metadata/
